attributes.action: Cap politicians wage to 60,000 a year. No food or travel allowance in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.parliament.uk/about/mps-and-lords/members/pay-mps/

Free school meal entitlement and child poverty ...
PDFhttps://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk › ...
attributes.background: Brexit's a disaster, a wage increase intolerable at this point! Childrens school meals in jeopardy which is a disgrace when politicians can claim £4800 per year on expenses and a childs lunch costs £360 per year. The people who pay your wages politicians,  this has to stop! Out of control #equality

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
